ISSUE-242.commit_message:
Fix BOM / encoding problems

* enable testhst_lhs_007, testhst_lhs_008 and testhst_lhs_009 for InputStream
* disable those tests on readers, as readers bypass any encoding
* do not try to discover the encoding used when the input is given a Reader
* add an SIO-8859-1 encoded coment in the test xml (testEncodingISO_8859_1_newReader and testEncodingISO_8859_1_InputStream_encoded tests do decode it wrongly as they use UTF-8)

Fix parsing an UTF-8 file without BOM and ISO-8859-1 encoding (#242)

* Deleted most code handling encoding (leaving that job to the XmlReader
* Fixed tests exercising encoding checks. Unsupported tests were skipped
* Simplified test-encoding-ISO-8859-1.xml test file

Skipped even more tests that pass on Linux but fail on Windows.
[maven-release-plugin] prepare for next development iteration
[maven-release-plugin] prepare release plexus-utils-3.5.1

Partial revert of "Support combine.self='remove'" to fix MNG-7709 (#241)

This reverts commit 89f74c56f4e15b0603c5e8f76cbe4b3c0a1e880a.

# Conflicts:
#	src/test/java/org/codehaus/plexus/util/xml/Xpp3DomTest.java

Fix reading comments with UTF chars (fixes #238) (#240)

* Fix reading comments with UTF chars (fixes #238)
* Fix printable methods to account for UTF chars

plexus-xml-4.commit_message:
Fix tests

The behavior has changed with https://github.com/codehaus-plexus/plexus-utils/issues/216 but plexus-utils contains duplicate merge code in Xpp3Dom and Xpp3DomUtils and the two pieces have divered.  This duplication is removed by the PR by switching to the XmlNode implementation in both cases, but we now need to fix the expectations.
Use maven-api-xml and maven-xml-impl as the Xpp3Dom implementation
remove dependency on plexus-utils
extract xml package for plexus-xml 4

spotless.commit_message: Reformat using spotless:apply
Update to parent 12
Fix SCM information (#254)
Fix non contiguous imports (#255)
Fix false difference detected with CachingOutputStream/CachingWriter when streams are flushed (#252)
Switch to junit 5 (#245)
Remove unused/unmaintained jira export (#247)
Switch build ci workflow to master branch (#250)
Use codehaus-plexus workflow
Add ossrh snapshot repository
Add deploy job
link to plexus-xml Git repo
Add dependency on plexus-xml to keep compatibility and deprecate the reader/writer factories with no direct replacement
remove xml package for plexus-utils 4

Bump maven-resources-plugin from 2.7 to 3.3.1 (#209)

[maven-release-plugin] prepare release plexus-utils-3.5.0

Don't throw IOException when none is required (#206)

This fixes #206 and closes #221

Xpp3DomUtils#mergeIntoXpp3Dom() must not override the dominant value in case it is empty (#216)

This fixes #216 and closes #217

Xpp3DomUtils#mergeIntoXpp3Dom() must not override the dominant value in case it is blank (#212)

This fixes #212 and closes #213

Deprecate Xpp3DomUtils#isEmpty(String) and Xpp3DomUtils#isNotEmpty(String) in favour of same named methods in StringUtils (#215)

This fixes #215 and closes #218

isEmpty(String) must not return false for whitespace-only values

This closes #214

Don't throw IOException when none is required (#206)

This fixes #212 and closes #213

This fixes #215 and closes #218
